job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Where Innovation Meets Excellence! We're transforming the banking industry with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled customer experiences. Be part of a dynamic team that's redefining the future of digital banking. Together, we'll create groundbreaking solutions and achieve incredible success. Your journey to making a real impact starts here!"
       Backbase created the Backbase Engagement Banking Platform - a unified platform with the customer at the center, helping banks orchestrate seamless journeys across every stage of the customer lifecycle.
       From customer onboarding, to customer servicing, customer loyalty and loan origination, we help financial institutions surpass customers' expectations in every phase of the customer lifecycle.
       Built from the ground up with the customer at the heart, our Engagement Banking Platform easily plugs into existing core banking systems and comes pre-integrated with the latest fintechs so financial institutions can innovate at scale.
       Industry analysts Forrester, Gartner, Celent, Omdia and IDC continuously recognize Backbase's category leadership position.
       What you'll do
       Are you passionate about exploring cutting-edge advancements in AI and software engineering? Do algorithms excite you, and do you thrive on tackling complex, data-driven challenges? If you're a true team player who's ready to roll with a crew of experts, we want you on our squad!
       Join us as a Senior AI Engineer and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to creating innovative AI solutions that will transform the banking landscape.
       Responsibilities:
          + Design, develop, and deploy AI driven platform capabilities, part of a state of the art orchestration and automation platform;
          + Analyze available data for training machine learning models or fine-tuning LLMs;
          + Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow;
          + Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions;
          + Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments;
          + Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams.
       Who you are, Loud and busy sometimes but always friendly, helpful, and super fun. We love to celebrate each other's achievements, share jokes, and our love for food, movies, traveling, and sports. We're one big and diverse family working towards the same goal.
       Lunch
       Free, healthy lunches every day. Plus snacks and drinks.
       Social
       Friday parties every month. Office boat you can use with your team.
       Health
       Discounted gym membership through our corporate fitness plan.
       Training budget
       Specific budget for your personal development.
job_details.full_text:
Senior AI Engineer

Where Innovation Meets Excellence! We're transforming the banking industry with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled customer experiences. Be part of a dynamic team that's redefining the future of digital banking. Together, we'll create groundbreaking solutions and achieve incredible success. Your journey to making a real impact starts here!"
       Backbase created the Backbase Engagement Banking Platform - a unified platform with the customer at the center, helping banks orchestrate seamless journeys across every stage of the customer lifecycle.
       From customer onboarding, to customer servicing, customer loyalty and loan origination, we help financial institutions surpass customers' expectations in every phase of the customer lifecycle.
       Built from the ground up with the customer at the heart, our Engagement Banking Platform easily plugs into existing core banking systems and comes pre-integrated with the latest fintechs so financial institutions can innovate at scale.
       Industry analysts Forrester, Gartner, Celent, Omdia and IDC continuously recognize Backbase's category leadership position.
       What you'll do
       Are you passionate about exploring cutting-edge advancements in AI and software engineering? Do algorithms excite you, and do you thrive on tackling complex, data-driven challenges? If you're a true team player who's ready to roll with a crew of experts, we want you on our squad!
       Join us as a Senior AI Engineer and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to creating innovative AI solutions that will transform the banking landscape.
       Responsibilities:
          + Design, develop, and deploy AI driven platform capabilities, part of a state of the art orchestration and automation platform;
          + Analyze available data for training machine learning models or fine-tuning LLMs;
          + Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow;
          + Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions;
          + Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments;
          + Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams.
       Who you are, Loud and busy sometimes but always friendly, helpful, and super fun. We love to celebrate each other's achievements, share jokes, and our love for food, movies, traveling, and sports. We're one big and diverse family working towards the same goal.
       Lunch
       Free, healthy lunches every day. Plus snacks and drinks.
       Social
       Friday parties every month. Office boat you can use with your team.
       Health
       Discounted gym membership through our corporate fitness plan.
       Training budget
       Specific budget for your personal development.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, developing, and deploying AI-driven platform capabilities, analyzing data for training ML models or fine-tuning LLMs, and leveraging composable frameworks for implementing AI-driven capabilities as services or agentic flows. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in areas like fine-tuning LLMs and building agentic systems, as well as the need for software development to integrate these capabilities into user-facing systems. While ML modeling is mentioned, the focus on LLMs and agentic flows points more towards GenAI than traditional ML Engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Analyze available data for training machine learning models or fine-tuning LLMs' directly relates to the process of creating and adapting models.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze available data for training machine learning models or fine-tuning LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow' describes the development and implementation of AI models, specifically mentioning agentic flows which are characteristic of GenAI.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, develop, and deploy AI driven platform capabilities, part of a state of the art orchestration and automation platform' involves building and deploying software systems that incorporate AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and deploy AI driven platform capabilities, part of a state of the art orchestration and automation platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments' relates to ensuring the robustness and scalability of AI-powered software.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions' highlights the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams' implies understanding the broader context and communicating technical solutions within the organization.
job_tasks.phrase: Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams
